code: import{fromJS}from'immutable';import*as constants from'./constants';var defaultState=fromJS({login:false});export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.CHANGE_LOGIN:return state.set('login',action.value);case constants.LOGOUT:return state.set('login',action.value);default:return state;}});
